description: This file defines a React functional component named Dashboard that renders user profile information, feature list, and tailored content by fetching data from API services. It manages state with hooks and displays different UI elements based on authentication status and loading/error conditions.

methods.name: Dashboard({ onRequestLogin })
methods.description: React functional component rendering user dashboard with profile info, features, and tailored content, fetched asynchronously on component mount and user authentication status change.
